viewMenu() - Method in class wsp.Dean
Displays the dean's menu, allowing them to view requests, sign requests, view news, view papers, exit, and optionally view the researcher menu if they are also a researcher.
viewMenu() - Method in class wsp.Employee
Displays the employee menu, allowing them to perform various actions such as sending a request, sending an order, viewing one news, viewing all papers, saving the database, and exiting.
viewMenu() - Method in class wsp.GraduateStudent
Displays the graduate student's menu, allowing them to perform various actions such as viewing transcript, viewing marks for a course, registering for a course, viewing a teacher for a course, viewing all courses, rating teachers, accessing the organization menu, viewing all papers, viewing one news, exiting and additional option to view the researcher menu.
viewMenu() - Method in class wsp.Manager
Displays the manager's menu, allowing them to perform various actions such as creating a statistical report, adding a course, adding a lesson to a teacher, creating news, viewing requests, editing news, assigning a course for a teacher, viewing students, viewing teachers, creating a journal, viewing all papers, and exiting.
viewMenu() - Method in class wsp.Researcher
Views the menu for the researcher, providing options to view papers, create papers, view projects, view journals, and add papers to a journal.
viewMenu() - Method in class wsp.Student
Displays the student's menu, allowing them to perform various actions such as viewing transcripts, marks, registering for courses, viewing teachers for courses, viewing all courses, viewing subscribed journals, rating teachers, accessing the organization menu, viewing news, subscribing to a journal, viewing all papers, and exiting.
viewMenu() - Method in class wsp.Teacher
Displays the teacher's menu, allowing them to perform various actions such as viewing courses, students, marks, putting marks, viewing rate, viewing news, sending orders and requests, viewing papers, and exiting.
viewMenu() - Method in class wsp.TechSupportSpecialist
Displays the menu for the tech support specialist, allowing them to view orders, accept or reject orders, view all papers, save the database, and exit.
viewMenu() - Method in class wsp.User
Abstract method to be implemented by subclasses for displaying the user-specific menu in the system.
